parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optional data to fetch from the blockchain:
- `balance` to get the balance of this address.
- `code` to get the code at this address.
- `nonce` to get the next available transaction nonce for this address.
- `contractLookup` to get the contract(s) details for this address.

post.description: Links an address to a contract.

startingBlock.description: The block number from which to start syncing events. The value can be `latest` for the latest block number, an absolute block number (e.g. `123` for the block number 123), or a relative block number (e.g. `-100` for 100 blocks before the latest block). If absent, the event monitor will be disabled for this contract and events won't be synced.

delete.description: Unlinks an address from a contract.

get.description: Returns the event monitor status for a given address and contract.

gasPrice.description: Gas price to use for the cancel/resubmit.

gasFeeCap.description: Gas fee cap to use for the EIP-1559 cancel/resubmit.

gasTipCap.description: Gas priority fee cap to use for the EIP-1559 cancel/resubmit.

gas.description: Gas limit to set for the cancel/resubmit.

nonce.description: The next transaction nonce for this address (obtained from the blockchain node).

localNonce.description: The next transaction nonce for this address when using the nonce management feature.

createdAt.description: The time the API key was created.

lastUsedAt.description: The time the API key was last used.

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created the API key.

signature.description: The signature of the API key.

key.description: The secret key of the API key.

clientID.description: The Application ID that will be accessing the Key Vault.

clientSecret.description: The applications secret key that you generate when you first register the application in Azure.

subscriptionID.description: The ID linked to your subscription to Azure services.

baseGroupName.description: The Resource Group Name for the resource being accessed.

vaultName.description: The name given to the vault your key is stored in.

baseFee.description: The current base fee (only available for chains that support EIP-1559).

List of contract event's input arguments.

rawAbi.description: The contract raw ABI JSON string.

ContractInformation.description: The contract information within the event or transaction.

verified.description: Indicates whether the contract has been verified.

verifiedSource.description: The name of the service that provided the contract verification.

verifiedLink.description: The URL to the contract's verification details on the verification service.

proxy.description: Indicates whether the contract is a proxy contract.

DeployContractTransaction.title: DeployContractTransaction
DeployContractTransaction.description: The transaction returned when you deploy a contracts.

HSMSignRequestPersonalSign.title: HSMSignRequestPersonalSign

chainId.description: Optionally lock the message to a specific chain by encoding the chain ID in the signature per EIP-155.

HSMSignResponse.title: HSMSignResponse
HSMSignResponse.description: Response body representing a sign-data response.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: An event returned by the API call.

triggeredAt.description: The time at which the event was triggered.

EventInformation.title: EventInformation
EventInformation.description: The event information returned as part of an event.

inputs.description: The list of input arguments for the event.

rawFields.description: The raw output from an event. Omitted when returned as part of a transaction receipt.

indexInLog.description: The event's index in the log.

EventField.title: EventField
EventField.description: Holds a field in the event's data.

hashed.description: Has the value been hashed into a keccak256 string?

MethodArg.title: MethodArg
MethodArg.description: An argument passed to a method call.

HSMData.title: HSMData
HSMData.description: Response body for returning HSM Data.

clientID.description: The Application ID that will be accessing the Key Vault.

vaultName.description: The name given to the vault your key is stored in.

clientID.description: The Application ID that will be accessing the Key Vault.

vaultName.description: The name given to the vault your key is stored in.

ContractParameter.title: ContractParameter
ContractParameter.description: Type conversion options for an input or an output of a function or an event.

ContractEventOptions.title: ContractEventOptions
ContractEventOptions.description: Type conversion options for an event.

ContractMethodOptions.title: ContractMethodOptions
ContractMethodOptions.description: Type conversion options for a function.

topics.description: A list of topics provided by the contract.

removed.description: True if this log was reverted due to a chain reorganization.

TypeConversionOptions.title: TypeConversionOptions
TypeConversionOptions.description: Represents the set of type conversions allowed for a particular input or output of a function (how it may be "cast").

EventTypeConversionOptions.title: EventTypeConversionOptions
EventTypeConversionOptions.description: Type conversion options for each of the inputs of an event.

MethodTypeConversionOptions.title: MethodTypeConversionOptions
MethodTypeConversionOptions.description: Type conversion options for each of the inputs and outputs of a function.

PostMethodArgs.title: PostMethodArgs
PostMethodArgs.description: Arguments to be passed into a contract function.

nonce.description: Nonce to use for the transaction execution.

gasPrice.description: Gas price to use for the transaction execution.

gasFeeCap.description: Gas fee cap to use for the 1559 transaction execution.

gasTipCap.description: Gas priority fee cap to use for the 1559 transaction execution.

gas.description: Gas limit to set for the transaction execution.

value.description: Amount (in wei) to send with the transaction.

signAndSubmit.description: If the `from` address is an HSM address and this flag is set to `true`, the transaction will be automatically signed and submitted to the blockchain.

nonceManagement.description: If the `from` address is an HSM address and this flag is set to `true`, MultiBaas will keep track of the nonce and set it accordingly. This is particularly useful when submitting multiple transactions concurrently or in a very short period of time. If this flag is set to `true` and a `nonce` is provided, it will reset the nonce tracker to the given nonce (useful if the nonce tracker is out of sync).

preEIP1559.description: If set to `true`, forces a legacy type transaction. Otherwise an EIP-1559 transaction will created if the network supports it.

formatInts.description:
Mode to format integer outputs in the function call's responses. There are 3 possible modes:
  - `auto` (the default option), where number format is decided by its type:
    - If the type has size at most 32 bits, then the number is returned verbatim.
    - If the type has size larger than 32 bits, then the number is returned as a string.
  - `as_numbers`, where all numbers are returned verbatim.
  - `as_strings`, where all numbers are returned as strings.

timestamp.description: Call the function at a specific timestamp. Only available for read functions calls and if the `historical_blocks_feature` is enabled (see the plan endpoint). Mutually exclusive with the `blockNumber` parameter.

blockNumber.description: Call the function at a specific block. Only available for read functions calls and if the `historical_blocks_feature` is enabled (see the plan endpoint). Mutually exclusive with the `timestamp` parameter.

contractOverride.description: If set to true the given address and contract don't need to be linked for the function to be called.

PreviewArgs.title: PreviewArgs
PreviewArgs.description: Ephemeral configuration for previewing the effect of a Type Conversion on a contract function call.

inputsOnly.description: Only preview the effect of a Type Conversion on the inputs. Only applicable for write function calls, where the output is an unsigned transaction.

inputs.description: Type Conversion information for the function inputs. The number of inputs must match that of the actual function inputs. The parameter is a contract function argument where only the type conversion information is used.

outputs.description: Type Conversion information for the function outputs. The number of outputs must match that of the actual function outputs. The parameter is a contract function argument where only the type conversion information is used.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: A transaction from the Ethereum Blockchain.

AccessTuple.title: AccessTuple
AccessTuple.description: An access tuple representing an address and its storage keys.

Blob.title: Blob
Blob.description: A 4844 data blob (131072 bytes) encoded as a hex string.

Commitment.title: Commitment
Commitment.description: A serialized polynomial commitment (48 bytes) encoded as a hex string.

Proof.title: Proof
Proof.description: A serialized proof of the quotient polynomial (48 bytes) encoded as a hex string.

SignedTransactionSubmission.title: SignedTransactionSubmission
SignedTransactionSubmission.description: The object used to receive a pre-signed raw transaction.

SignedTransactionResponse.title: SignedTransactionResponse
SignedTransactionResponse.description: A transaction that was signed externally and submitted.

SetNonceRequest.title: SetNonceRequest
SetNonceRequest.description: Request body representing a set local nonce request.

nonce.description: If nonce is specified the provided value is set, otherwise the value is read from the blockchain.

TransactionData.title: TransactionData
TransactionData.description: The transaction data returned from a call to get transaction by hash.

isPending.description: Whether the transaction has been included yet.

TransactionInformation.title: TransactionInformation
TransactionInformation.description: The transaction information returned as part of an event.

txIndexInBlock.description: The location of the transaction in the block.

CloudWalletTXToSign.title: CloudWalletTXToSign
CloudWalletTXToSign.description: A Cloud Wallet transaction to be signed.

nonce.description: Sender account nonce of the transaction

gasFeeCap.description: Fee cap per gas of the transaction

gasTipCap.description: GasTipCap per gas of the transaction

value.description: Amount (in wei) to send with the transaction.

gasFeeCap.description: Fee cap per gas of the transaction

gasTipCap.description: GasTipCap per gas of the transaction

value.description: Amount (in wei) to send with the transaction.

MethodCallResponse.title: MethodCallResponse
MethodCallResponse.description: The result of a function call.

MethodCallPreviewResponse.description: The result of a preview function arguments call.

FieldType.title: FieldType
FieldType.description: The field type in a select or filter.

EventQueryField.title: EventQueryField
EventQueryField.description: A single event field's query information.

name.description: The field name. Either `name` or `inputIndex` is required if `fieldType == "input"`.

inputIndex.description: The field's index, can be used in place of `name`.

alias.description: The name that will be used to return the field.

aggregator.description: The type of aggregation to perform on the field.

rule.description: The rule type, can be omitted if this is the last filter to be applied.

inputIndex.description: The field's index, can be used in place of `name`.

value.description: The value to be compared with.

children.description: Other filters to be applied in succession with the rule specified.

EventQueryEvent.title: EventQueryEvent
EventQueryEvent.description: A query on a single event.

select.description: The query information about all the fields to select from an event.

groupBy.description: The results will be grouped according to this field. An aggregator for non Group By fields must be specified if groupBy is specified.

orderBy.description: The results will be ordered according to this field.

order.description: Specify ascending or descending order, the default is "ASC".

isSystem.description: Specifies if this a system-generated query which is not modifiable by the user.

EventQueryResults.title: EventQueryResults
EventQueryResults.description: Results of an executed event query.

resubmissionAttempts.description: The total number of resubmission attempts.

successfulResubmissions.description: The total number of successful resubmission (added into the transaction pool).

createdAt.description: The time the transaction was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the transaction was last updated.

failed.description: Whether the transaction failed when it was included in a block.

blockNumber.description: The block number that the transaction was included in.

url.description: The URL to send the webhook to.

nextAttempt.description: The time the next attempt will be made.

lastAttempt.description: The time the last attempt was made.

failedCalls.description: The number of failed webhook endpoint calls since the last successful call.

lastError.description: The last error received from the webhook endpoint.

createdAt.description: The time the webhook was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the webhook was last updated.

secret.description: The secret key used to sign the webhook.

id.description: The ID of the webhook event.

data.description: The data associated with the event.

createdAt.description: The time the webhook event was created.

deliveredAt.description: The time the webhook event was last updated.

WebhookEventsType.title: WebhookEventsType
WebhookEventsType.description: The type of the webhook event.

Keccak256Hash.title: Keccak256Hash
Keccak256Hash.description: The keccak256 hash as a hex string of 256 bits.

Alias.title: Alias
Alias.description: An alias to easily identify and reference addresses.

Label.title: Label
Label.description: An alias to easily identify and reference the entity in subsequent requests.

PaginationLimit.title: PaginationLimit
PaginationLimit.description: Specify the number of records that should be returned.

PaginationOffset.title: PaginationOffset
PaginationOffset.description: Specify the number of records that need to be skipped.

TransactionStatus.title: TransactionStatus
TransactionStatus.description: The status of a TXM transaction.

items.description: The group IDs to add the invited user to.

actionByID.description: The ID of the user who performed the action.

actionOnID.description: The ID of the user who was acted upon.

actionByUserEmail.description: The email of the user who performed the action.

actionOnUserEmail.description: The email of the user who was acted upon.

type.description: The type of action that was performed.

createdAt.description: The time the action was performed.

activityData.description: The data associated with the action.

EIP712Types.description: A mapping of type names to arrays of fields.

EIP712Domain.description: The domain fields for EIP-712. All fields are optional per the specification.

name.description: Human-readable name of the signing domain.

version.description: Current major version of the signing domain.

chainId.description: The EIP-155 chain ID of the application using the typed data.

primaryType.description: The root type of the message object. Must correspond to a key in the `types` object.

message.description: The actual data, conforming to the `primaryType` definition in `types`.
